about_the_game:
Are you ready for action and racing fun? Because that is exactly what you get here.
You can set best times or even compete with your teammates.
But if you loose the desire to race, you can also prove yourself in the two other modes.

In short, you will only win in Destruction Derby or Demolition Derby as the last survivor.
The Destruction Derby and Demolition Derby differ enormously.
In Destruction Derby, also known as DD, you basically only have to try to be the last survivor to win without
other support.
Demolition Derby is different, because it is a parkour to drive to reach a military vehicle at the end of the track.

Features

  • Multiplayer (1 - 16 players) - Whether you want to set the best times on your own or want to try out new DD / DM routes, everything is possible.

  • Multiple pickups. - From nitroboost and repairkits to vehicle changes in the race.

  • Map Editor - Fully customizable maps and all necessary assets provided. You have the opportunity to create your own maps and share them with the commnity.

  • Map Editor multiplayer ready - Join your friends while they are creating maps, so you can test it with them

  • Dedicated server - For everyone who wants to play on a persistent server. Choose the maps and gamemodes you like and play with your friends.

  • Lobby - Everyone can create ingame a lobby and let other join into it

  • Air movement - Move your vehicle in the air, so a good landing is no problem anymore

  • Workshop - The workshop integration helps you to distribute your map creation

  • Prove yourself - Try to becoming the best racing driver

  • Survive, win and live to tell the story!
detailed_description:
Are you ready for action and racing fun? Because that is exactly what you get here.
You can set best times or even compete with your teammates.
But if you loose the desire to race, you can also prove yourself in the two other modes.

In short, you will only win in Destruction Derby or Demolition Derby as the last survivor.
The Destruction Derby and Demolition Derby differ enormously.
In Destruction Derby, also known as DD, you basically only have to try to be the last survivor to win without
other support.
Demolition Derby is different, because it is a parkour to drive to reach a military vehicle at the end of the track.

Features

  • Multiplayer (1 - 16 players) - Whether you want to set the best times on your own or want to try out new DD / DM routes, everything is possible.

  • Multiple pickups. - From nitroboost and repairkits to vehicle changes in the race.

  • Map Editor - Fully customizable maps and all necessary assets provided. You have the opportunity to create your own maps and share them with the commnity.

  • Dedicated server - For everyone who wants to play on a persistent server. Choose the maps and gamemodes you like and play with your friends.

  • Lobby - Everyone can create ingame a lobby and let other join into it

name: Race Project

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Win 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Win 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4690K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Win or loose, it's easy! The rules are simple, be the first who crosses the finish line or survive. Believe me, don't trust anyone!
